main event: A silver, circular, saucer-shaped object was observed rapidly maneuvering in Danville, California on February 5, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting was for about 30 seconds and was made by a private citizen,The observer described the object as erratic in course,The sighting occurred at 2030 PST,The object was reported to be faster than a jet aircraft,The object was observed without any supporting radars or aircraft scrambled.
